item.title: Jee add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "With enough courage, you can do without a reputation." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Jee add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jee add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jee add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is not everyone,' said Elinor, 'who has your passion for dead leaves." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jee add a quote by Margaret Peterson Haddix
item.description: "Maybe everyone is just waiting for someone else to save them." -- Margaret Peterson Haddix

item.title: Jee add a quote by Margaret Peterson Haddix
item.description: "...even the most independent people sometimes needed help. And if I'd learned nothing else from my life thus far, it was that you don't always end up where you think you're going." -- Margaret Peterson Haddix

item.title: Jee add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I think the only way to get through this life is laughing hard and constantly, mostly at myself." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Jee add a quote by D. J. MacHale
item.description: "There are two types of people in this world. People who hate clowns...and clowns. (Bobby Pendragon)" -- D. J. MacHale

item.title: Jee add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "What she had long believed was not true, and now the world was wide open to discover what was. It is like all my life I thought the sky was green." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Jee add a quote by Ann Rinaldi
item.description: "A person doesn't ask permission to fall in love; not even of themselves." -- Ann Rinaldi

item.title: Jee add a quote by Ann Rinaldi
item.description: "Love is like light and there are two kinds, the bursting fireworks of the moment and the solid, fixed stars that sometimes become obscured in the heavens, but are always there, year after year, for a lifetime." -- Ann Rinaldi

item.title: Jee add a quote by Ann Rinaldi
item.description: "Let me say the good are often punished unfairly." -- Ann Rinaldi

item.title: Jee add a quote by Ann Rinaldi
item.description: "Sometimes it take courage to leave." -- Ann Rinaldi

item.title: Jee add a quote by Ann Rinaldi
item.description: "There are depths to the human soul that should not be fathomed." -- Ann Rinaldi

item.title: Jee add a quote by Juliet Marillier
item.description: "<i>So you do believe in... true love?</i> she whispered. I took a deep breath, <i>I think I have to,</i> I said, blinking back tears. <i>Without it, we're all going nowhere.</i>" -- Juliet Marillier

item.title: Jee add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Jee add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Jee add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "Right now I'd like all my troubles to stand in front of me in a straight line, and one by one I'd give each a black eye. " -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Jee add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "In a weak moment, I have written a book." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Jee add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Jee add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Jee add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "I try to stay in a constant state of confusion just because of the expression it leaves on my face." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Jee add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jee add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Jee add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "Wendy," Peter Pan continued in a voice that no woman has ever yet been able to resist, "Wendy, one girl is more use than twenty boys." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Jee add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie
